A: Doctor! You must come to help my brother. He is frightfully ill. Please!

B: In these troubling times the sick outnumber the fit. I'm afraid necessity has made my prices steep...

A: I will pay whatever the cost!

ChoiceA: Aye. Well. Lead me to the patient, but I make no promises.

ChoiceA.A: Bless you, doctor! Right this way, quickly!

ChoiceB: I cannot. Return later if he doesn't recover on his own...

ChoiceB.A: Nobody recovers on their own! I hope this plague takes you!
